mapper.insert: insert into mvcboard(idx, name, subject, content, ref, lev, seq) values(mvcboard_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, mvcboard_idx_seq.currval, 0, 0)
insert into mvcboard(idx, name, subject, content, ref, lev, seq) values(mvcboard_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, mvcboard_idx_seq.currval, #{lev}, #{seq})
mapper.select: select * from mvcboard order by ref desc, seq asc
mapper.update: update mvcboard set hit = hit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
